name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Theme songs are saved as theme.mp3 in media folders along with metadata in theme.json files. Supports both movies and TV shows. Features a complete Web UI with drag-and-drop upload.

versions.changelog: Fixed infinite retry loop - changed from window.itemHelper to MutationObserver pattern. Now properly detects action sheet menus (.actionSheet) and dynamically injects 'Assign Theme Song' menu item when three-dot menu opens for movies and TV shows.

Fixed infinite retry loop - changed from window.itemHelper to MutationObserver pattern. Now properly detects action sheet menus (.actionSheet) and dynamically injects 'Assign Theme Song' menu item when three-dot menu opens for movies and TV shows.

CRITICAL FIX: Changed UI integration from adding button to mainDetailButtons to properly hooking into Jellyfin's three-dot menu system. Menu item 'Assign Theme Song' now appears in the three-dot menu for movies and TV shows as per requirements.

CRITICAL FIX: Fixed ScriptController namespace and route from 'AssignThemeSong' to 'xThemeSong' to match plugin name. Added comprehensive logging to transformation callback. These fixes resolve script injection issues that prevented the Web UI menu item from appearing.

CRITICAL FIX: Plugin constructor now includes IServerConfigurationManager parameter matching HoverTrailer pattern. Plugin should now load successfully with proper dependency injection. Added comprehensive logging for debugging plugin initialization.
